brief_title: A Study and 12 Month Extension to Evaluate Two Investigational Drugs in Postmenopausal Women With Osteoporosis (MK-0217-907)
brief_summary: The purpose of this study and 12 month extension is to evaluate the effects of two investigational drugs on osteoporosis in postmenopausal women.
intervention_name: MK0217, alendronate sodium/Duration of Intervention: 12 mo
Comparator: risedronate / Duration of Intervention: 12 mo
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Postmenopausal women with osteoporosis Exclusion Criteria: - Any known allergy to the study drug
